item.title: Top Tech Conferences & Events to Add to Your Calendar in 2025
item.description:
A great way to stay current with the latest technology trends and innovations is by attending conferences. Read and bookmark our tech events guide.

item.title: IBM Completes HashiCorp Acquisition for $6.4 Billion, Expanding Hybrid Cloud Offerings
item.description:
HashiCorp brings infrastructure provisioning that will help some IBM products run more smoothly in hybrid cloud environments.

Go to Source

item.title: Learn How to Code From Scratch and Get Microsoft Visual Studio for Only $56
item.description:
Even if you have no tech experience, you can learn how to code from courses that are designed specifically for beginners. In addition to this bundle, you get Microsoft Visual Studio Professional included in the price.

Go to Source

item.title: Mozilla Revises Firefox Terms of Use After Inflaming Users Over Data Usage
item.description:
In response to users’ feedback about the Firefox Terms of Use, Mozilla updated some of the language about data usage. Mozilla also updated its Privacy FAQ.

Go to Source

item.title: TechRepublic Premium Editorial Calendar: Policies, Hiring Kits, and Glossaries for Download
item.description:
TechRepublic Premium content helps you solve your toughest IT issues and jump-start your career or next project.

item.title: Why is Apple Taking Legal Action Against UK’s Government?
item.description:
Apple told TechRepublic it is “gravely disappointed” to remove Advanced Data Protection in the U.K., as it fights government demands for an iCloud backdoor.

Go to Source

item.title: Gartner: Samsung Was the Top Semiconductor Vendor Globally in 2024
item.description:
Samsung Electronics returned to number one partially on the strength of its memory device sales. Intel and NVIDIA followed in the rankings in spots two and three, respectively.

Go to Source

item.title: DeepSeek Locked Down Public Database Access That Exposed Chat History
item.description:
Research Firm Wiz Research began investigating DeepSeek soon after its generative AI took the tech world by storm.

Go to Source

item.title: DeepSeek Chatbot Beats OpenAI on App Store Leaderboard
item.description:
The Chinese firm said it cost just $5.6 million to train a model that can reason through complex answers and compete with OpenAI’s o1.

item.title: How to Protect and Secure Your Data in 10 Ways
item.description:
Use this comprehensive list of strategies to help you safeguard your company’s data from threats and data breaches.

item.title: Nextiva Review (2025): Is it Right for My Business?
item.description:
Wondering if Nextiva is the best choice for your team? Check out the full review to learn about its standout features, pros, cons and closest competitors in the business communications space.

item.title: Google, Apple Under Investigation to Determine Compliance with New UK Competition Law
item.description:
If Google or Apple is deemed to have Strategic Market Status in the U.K., the government might force it to make the user data it collects available to competitors, or give publishers more control over how their data is used.

Go to Source
